item.title: World News
item.description: /c/World News on rabbitea.rs [home] [/c/news ðŸŒŽ] [rabbitea.rs] Description Discuss the daily news. # Rules 1. All links must be from vettable news sources (eg. No tabloids - NY Post,The Sun, etc) 2. Conversations must remain civil and align with the site rules. 3. Submissions must be recent (less than a week old) and must be a specific news article 4. The submitted articles title should exactly match the title on the news site
